title: Why an AoE heal on Fiora's ult?
body:
I really like what Riot has done with Fiora's kit, but there is one thing that left me bugging.

Why an AoE heal on her ult? What does that have to do with a duelist?
Duelist are not supportive caracters by nature, they are the opposite actualy. They focus on their individual skill to win fights.

So why an AoE Heal? Why not heal herself only with maybe an AD/Movement Speed steroid? I don't get it.

replies.body:
Someone on Reddit actually explained it in a way that made some sense to me.

It is the idea of applause/victory reward at the end of a duel that you have won.

Yeah, this is the thematic tie-in that we were going for. Fiora's duel, or 'Grand Challenge,' is a game defining moment for everyone, not just the combatants. Fiora's team should care about whether or not she's successful and be able to join in the celebration if she is.

Gameplay wise, adding reasons for Fiora's team to care about her in important. Selfish champions can lead to degenerate teamplay experiences, whether they are winning _or_ losing. Accordingly, by adding some team utility to her personal challenges, we can make Fiora a strong 1-on-1 duelist while keeping her team invested in her success. Heal might feel weird here, and I totally get that, but it was the most fitting tool in our box.

Plus the AOE heal is already kind of Janna's thing
That's a "disengage and regroup" ult. New Fiora is a "victory and second wind" effect. I'd say they're pretty different.

You can use Janna's ult for both, and a dozen other things. Sometimes I use it during baron if I think the enemy are on their way. Sometimes I bait Leona and then throw her under turret. Sometimes I want somebody to go away and throw them through a wall. Janna's ult has a surprising number of potential uses~

> 

I don't wanna be that guy but that really sounds like you made that shit up because there is no real reason for it to be in her kit. Healing your team does not come to mind when you think Grand Duelist. ESPECIALLY one that heals for 1000+ health at lvl 18 as a BASE.

Let's make Talon's team get damage amp when he kills someone because they're all happy he assassinated his target. Makes sense, right?

A better ult would have been to give her an isolating mechanic, where she ults a target and they become untargetble by everyone except Fiora, and Fiora also becomes untargetable by everyone except for the target of her ult.

In other words, she challenges them to a duel that they cannot refuse, and no one, not the enemy team, not even Fiora's team is going to stop it from happening or interrupt it.

The current mechanic on her ult just makes no damn sense in the slightest for a duelist and actually detracts from her identity as a whole.

Duelists aren't teamfighters, stop trying to force a champion be something that it is not.

Any ally who enters the area walks out with some bonus stats for a little bit, encouraging them onward into battle, as oppose to the "good job Fiora, lets just sit and rest here for a sec" of the heal?

I already figured it was for the "Grand Challenge" you mentioned. I just don't get the AOE heal. It does not make that much THEMATIC SENSE. When someone duels, its **USUALLY 1v1** (Meaning **ITS NOT A TEAM EFFORT**). **A duel more of a SELFISH 1v1. You fight for honor, glory, pride, whatever, THE DUEL IS BETWEEN YOUR ONE TARGET AND YOURSELF.**

Besides, if I play as Garen and focus that one enemy carry down and give them justice, my team is happy I did my job, but I don't see MY TEAM getting buffed because of this. If I play Darius and kill one of the enemies, my team is happy I did my job will be happier as i proceed with my multi-kill but I don't see my team getting buffed. Fighters fight, win, move on and Fiora is no different. As a duelist, I believe her fight is more personal than .... whatever gave the idea she should give off an AOE heal (I am assuming that you want to make Fiora's "duel" feel like an arena?)

Listen, give Fiora a reward for winning her duel because she deserves it, but THE REWARD SHOULD NOT BE AN AOE HEAL. Keep searching for your answer. Fiora's fight as a duelist should feel more personal. That's the point of a duel.
